verbs.description: Trump Derangement Syndrome [V: can] really take a toll on people . Unfortunately , that was evident on Monday ’s CNN Tonight as CNN political analysts and White House Briefing Room rabble - rousers Brian Karem and April Ryan hijacked a segment meant to discuss First Lady Melania Trump ’s surgery to whine about the President ’s tweeting habits and his refusal to hold press conferences .
